commit message: Add support for the ACRA crash reporting library and move private API keys to their own separate class.

Fix #1

Automatic flash mode is now used instead of torch mode

Add internet access check

Proper error messages are now shown when the user is offline and internet access is required
Add a link to the website in README.md

Add Aragonese localization and correct some typos in the Catalan one

All the credits goes to Juan Pablo Martínez

Add French localization

All the credits goes to Bernard Chardonneau
Fixes and improvements in error reporting through ACRA

Fix camera in old Android versions

Camera preview is now stretched instead of cropped

Improve online translation

Fix the XML-RPC service and add support for the more reliable apy service

Proper support for online language pairs

Currently compatible with the Abu-MaTran API and the webpage of Matxin by Elhuyar
Use UTF-8 for the Abu-MaTran API

Change paragraph splitting in OCR

Paragraphs are now split by two or more newlines, and the rest of the newlines are removed from the text

Improve memory usage for OCR

A maximum resolution is now dynamically calculated so that the bitmaps don't exceed the 66.66% of the maximum heap size. This should solve most of the OutOfMemoryErrors.
More aggressive threshold for OCR binarization

Improve OCR memory management

This should definitely fix all the OutOfMemoryErrors.
Crop camera preview in supported Android versions
Add the option to enable OCR debugging from the settings
Allow installing the app on the external storage
Workaround to build even if the OCR debugging translations are missing
Update to Android Studio 0.8.6 and NDK r10
Add missing translations in Basque and Spanish
Improve focus handling for the source text
Add an option to change the display language

Improve language names

Language names are now given as string resources instead of relying entirely on those generated by java.util.Locale

Always visible card buttons

Card buttons are now disabled rather than hidden when their corresponding function is not available
Suppress the Lint error for a missing translation

Workaround for a bug in the Google Search app

All the supported languages are now usable in voice recognition even when the last version of Google Search is used. See https://productforums.google.com/forum/#!topic/websearch/PUjEPmdSzSE/discussion for more details.
Don't crash when openCV isnt available
Proper workaround for OpenCV loading errors
Fix some build issues in Ubuntu 14.04

Resolve #4

Try to pre-select the system language as the source language, which seems more appropriate than setting it as the target language.
Adapt the UI to Material Design
Use the Matxin API instead of relying on web scraping
Update the UI when network connectivity changes

Add support for non-default TTS engines

The app now tries to use non-default TTS engines for languages not supported by the default one.

New package management system

The new system is more flexible, implements a hashing and signature verification mechanism to protect from code injection attacks, and offers the option to install packages in external storage. A single XML manifest is now used, and all the packages have been updated and some new ones added.

Add Aragonese localization

All the credit goes to Juan Pablo Martínez
Dynamically check MT and OCR package compatibility
Fix for local packages missing in the manifest

Merge pull request #11 from rmtheis/master

Support Windows ndk-build

Add Catalan localization

All the credit goes to Xavi Ivars and Elhuyar Hizkuntza eta Teknologia

Add French localization

All the credit goes to Bernard Chardonneau and Elhuyar Hizkuntza eta Teknologia

Add Galician localization

All the credit goes to Elhuyar Hizkuntza eta Teknologia
Update the UI to Support Library 22.2.0
Add the string for the German language name

Add Asturian localization

All the credit for the translations goes to Softastur
Proper redirect handling between HTTP and HTTPS
